Dear Bills
You will be having a caller — one Harold
Niven — Asst. ^rof. of Radio-TV here at
Washington — sometime during the week of
May Uth to 10th.
In case you haven't met Hal before, you
will and should# now. He was previously
at Columbus and at East Bansing, so you may
know him. But anyhow I have suggested he
put your office to whatever uses he can
find for it while he's in town.
See you in Columbus mn a couple of weeks.
